user.title: Hue Cleaner Setup
user.description:
Enter your Philips Hue Hub IP address

To find your Hue Hub IP:
1. Open the Philips Hue app on your phone
2. Go to Settings â†’ Bridge
3. The IP will be shown there

Example: 192.168.1.100

connection_test.title: Connection Test
connection_test.description: Click 'Next' to test connection to your Hue Hub.

api_instructions.title: API Key Configuration
api_instructions.description: Now you need to configure the API key to communicate with your Hue Hub.

api_key.title: Enter API Key
api_key.description:
1. Go to your Hue Hub
2. Press the physical button
3. Come back here and enter the key

The key will appear after pressing the button on the hub.

final_test.title: Configuration Complete
final_test.description: The component is ready to use!

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Hue Hub. Please check the IP address and ensure the hub is powered on and connected to your network.
error.invalid_ip: Invalid IP address format. Please enter a valid IP address.
error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please press the button on your Hue Hub and try again.
error.final_test_failed: Final test failed. Please check the connection and try again.

abort.already_configured: Hue Cleaner is already configured for this Hue Hub.
